MAYBE   ternarySimplify: can simplify to (bool)$cond at testdata/embeddedrules/file.php:6
    sink($x ? true : false);
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
MAYBE   ternarySimplify: can simplify to $cond at testdata/embeddedrules/file.php:9
    sink($x > $y ? true : false);
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
MAYBE   ternarySimplify: use ?: shorthand for $a?$a:$b case at testdata/embeddedrules/file.php:12
    sink($x ? $x : $y);
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^
MAYBE   ternarySimplify: could use ?? (null coalesce operator) at testdata/embeddedrules/file.php:15
    sink(isset($x[1]) ? $x[1] : $y);
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
